this_title: Chronis Botsoglou: “I Was There Too and I Was Treated with a Plate of Lentil Soup …”
introduction: Chronis Botsoglou, acclaimed painter, professor, and lecturer at the Athens School of Fine Arts, is revealed through his lifelong work. His work unfolds through a discussion with his wife and muse, Eleni. Interviews with fellow painters, art historians, and curators, as well as unpublished work, complete the painter’s profile.
chinese_title: Chronis Botsoglou: “I Was There Too and I Was Treated with a Plate of Lentil Soup …”
